articles.content: These standards are promulgated pursuant to Article 70 of the Telecommunications Act.
Low Power Radio-frequency Devices statutory fees include both type approval fees and license fees.

With respect to each application for type approval of the Low Power Radio-frequency Devices, the Recognized Certification Bodies (hereinafter as RCB) shall charge an inspection fee as attached in the Table “Low Power Radio-frequency Devices Statutory Fees.”

The second and subsequent applications for the approval of low-power radio frequency devices (LPRFD) within the same product series shall be charged at half rate.
The aforementioned “product series” refers to that defined in Article 2 of “Compliance Approval Regulations on Controlled Telecommunications Radio-Frequency Devices”.

Those who apply for renewal or reissue due to the loss or damage of LPRFD approval certificate or amendments to the certificate description shall remit the certificate fees according to the statutory fee table.
The approval certificate mentioned in the preceding paragraph refers to that defined in Article 2 of “Compliance Approval Regulations on Controlled Telecommunications Radio-Frequency Devices”.
The Regulations shall become effective as of the date of promulgation.
